topic.title: Install the DNS Service with PowerDNS

section.title: Install DNS Service with PowerDNS
section.p: DNS Service defaults to the PowerDNS Backend if another backend is not configured for domain name service. PowerDNS will be deployed to one or more control planes clusters. The following configuration example denotes where the PowerDNS service is installed.

section.title: Configure the Backend
section.p:
Ensure the DNS Service components, and the PowerDNS component have been placed on a cluster. PowerDNS may be placed on a separate cluster to the other DNS Service components. control-planes: - name: control-plane-1 region-name: region1
clusters: - name: cluster1 service-components: - lifecycle-manager - mysql - ip-cluster - apache2 - ... - designate-api - designate-central - designate-pool-manager - designate-zone-manager - designate-mdns - designate-client - powerdns
